1.title: Tom Sachs at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: Tom Sachs and Glenn O'Brien discuss space, music and philosophy.

2.title: Naomi Campbell and Edward Enninful at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Naomi Campbell and Edward Enninful speak with Glenn O'Brien at the Beatrice Inn about how they were discovered, what it takes to be a good stylist, and their upcoming projects.

3.title: Jerry Saltz at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: Senior art critic and columnist for New York magazine sits with Glenn O'Brien to discuss the current state of art criticism, what he's most excited about in the art world right now, and why he dropped out of art school and drove trucks instead.

4.title: Pat and Anna Cleveland at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: Revered model, Pat Cleveland, one of the first black women to appear in Vogue, shares her experience of the superstar glory days of the modeling industry in the 70's and compares notes with daughter, Anna Cleveland, now a runway star in her own right.

5.title: Hailey Gates at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: Glenn O'Brien talks with Hailey Gates about her new Viceland series, "States of Undress." She goes into detail on what it really feels like to film and document women in places like Russia, Gaza, Venezuela, where the global fashion scene is heavily influenced by much larger cultural issues that the fashion industry tends to avoid.

6.title: Saul Williams at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: Poet and rapper Saul Williams touches on his earliest inspirations, Kanye West and meditating with Rick Rubin.

7.title: Nan Goldin at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: American photographer Nan Goldin discusses her intimate style of photography.

8.title: Baz Luhrmann at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: Celebrated director Baz Luhrmann explains his avant-garde approach to filmmaking and the future of storytelling.

1.title: Richard Prince at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: Master-appropriator Richard Prince talks Cowboys, Rastafarians, and Suicide Girls with Glenn O'Brien.

2.title: Proenza Schouler at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Proenza Schouler's Jack McCollough and Lazaro Hernandez talk first-class internships, second-rate sewing, and their new collection with Glenn O'Brien.

3.title: Gisele Bündchen at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: Supermodel Gisele Bündchen talks about her new book that profiles her career as a model. She discusses her first nude shoot, moving to Japan when she was 14, and what it was like being photographed by the world's most iconic photographers.

4.title: Shepard Fairey at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: Glenn O'Brien sits with Shepard Fairey to discuss the evolution of his work from street art to fine art. It's hard for the two not to draw parallels to the commercialism of Shepard's work and that of many before him.

5.title: Leandra Medine at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: Glenn O'Brien sits with Leandra Medine of Man Repeller to discuss what it's like to create a publication that competes with some of the largest brands in the world. They also talk front row at fashion week, what the industry isn't getting right, and Glenn's favorite part of the site, the Dick·shun·ary.

6.title: Safdie Brothers at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: New York filmmakers, Joshua and Ben Safdie, speak with Glenn O'Brien on making the film, "Heaven Knows What." The movie is based on the unpublished memoirs of a heroin addict living on the streets of New York.

7.title: Olivier Zahm at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: Glenn O'Brien sits with founder and owner of the French fashion and culture magazine Purple to discuss his career.

8.title: Inez and Vinoodh at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: Since 1986, Inez van Lamsweerde and Vinoodh Matadin have been brilliantly working together in the field of fashion photography. They sit with Glenn O'Brien to discuss their relationship, both personal and professional, as well as how they have embraced the ever changing environment of technology in order to test the conventional photography.

9.title: Chris Blackwell at the Beatrice

episode of.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: Founder of Island Records and record producer, Chris Blackwell, is a legend in his own right. Growing up in Jamaica then later moving to England for school, he forged the careers of Bob Marley, Jimmy Cliff, Grace Jones, Cat Stevens, Jethro Tull, U2, Nick Drake and many more. He talks with O'Brien about how the Jamaican music scene changed in the 60s and how he built the incredible empire that is Island Records.

imdb.title: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien
akas: Tea at the Beatrice with Glenn O'Brien (United States)
plot: Legendary editor and journalist, Glenn O'Brien, table talks with the industry's finest at New York City landmark, The Beatrice Inn.
